results.title: city school diary_03
results.brief_description: An anonymous digital dairy created by a young person as part of a day long workshop run by ACMI. Each diary is scripted and a voiceover recorded by the individual young person. Some diaries use photographs brought in by the participant, but the primary visual content is often black and white, ‘stock’ footage of a poetic nature. At no point should the creator or school be positively identified when screening this work.

results.title: The Colonel
results.creator_credit: Rolf De Heer, Jenifer Hooks and AFTRS
results.brief_description: An army colonel, having outlived his usefulness to the revolution, is imprisoned. Refusing to sign a false confession, he is eventually forced into a position of choice - his principles or his life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rolf De Heer, Jenifer Hooks and AFTRS

results.title: A Short portrait of obsession
results.creator_credit: Jarrod Factor and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
results.brief_description:
A narrative about an artist who is torn between the film he is editing and the girl he loves.
Intriguing experimental piece with music soundtrack and no commentary - original music by Jarrod Factor.
